description.originalText: Sam was wonderful with our two girls (9mo. and 2.5 yrs). She filled in for two full days when our regular childcare fell through. Very sweet and attentive, I was a bit frazzled and didn't give her much guidance, but she figured everything out on her own, and did a great job. Would definitely hire again!

description.displayText: Sam was great! We needed a nanny for a day for our two kids, and Sam was perfect. I gave her a lot of info in the morning, and she somehow managed to absorb it all. Plus, anything I forgot to tell her she just figured out herself. She's responsible, great with our kids, and we'd definitely call on her again. Thanks Sam!
description.originalText: Sam was great! We needed a nanny for a day for our two kids, and Sam was perfect. I gave her a lot of info in the morning, and she somehow managed to absorb it all. Plus, anything I forgot to tell her she just figured out herself. She's responsible, great with our kids, and we'd definitely call on her again. Thanks Sam!

description.displayText: We hired Sam as a backup to our full time childcare for a full week 9-6 to watch our 1 year old daughter in Brooklyn. Sam was so great, so patient, took our daughter out to the playground twice a day. Great with mealtime, reading, songs, etc. Sam gave 100% even when my daughter cried all day the first day. We definitely want to hire Sam again. Thank you, Sam! Xo
description.originalText: We hired Sam as a backup to our full time childcare for a full week 9-6 to watch our 1 year old daughter in Brooklyn. description.displayText: Samantha has nannied for my family for almost a year now. Her time with us is coming to an end shortly, as she is moving to New York. Sam has been nothing short of amazing. She is punctual, reliable, and wonderful with my daughter. We trusted Sam to pick our daughter up from daycare every day, prepped and gave dinner, followed by cleanup and bedtime routine. It will be tough to have Sam go, but I know she will be a wonderful nanny for another family.
description.originalText: Samantha has nannied for my family for almost a year now. Her time with us is coming to an end shortly, as she is moving to New York. Sam has been nothing short of amazing. It will be tough to have Sam go, but I know she will be a wonderful nanny for another family.

description.displayText: If you're looking for the absolute best care for your children, you've found her. Sam was a blessing for our family, and now everyone else has HUGE shoes to fill. We never hired anyone from care.com because I was hesitant to invite someone into our home that I had never met before. Sam stood out from all other applicants from the beginning with her personable sincerity, and demonstrated trustworthiness. After a great visit with our 10 month old, it was an easy decision to hire her. She went above-and-beyond every single day. She was always on time, maintained excellent communication with us, and most importantly, she was amazing with our son. He adored her. Sam does not charge what she's worth, and if you want to keep her around, I hope you'll realize that quickly as well. (give her a raise!) We wish Sam all the very best in NYC and for those reading this, your family will be in exceptional hands with her. Sincerely, Sarah  & Fam

description.displayText: It is with great honor and privilege to recommend Samantha for a nanny or babysitting position. Samantha served above and beyond our expectations as our trusted nanny for 6 months. It is also with great sadness that we had to say goodbye as she moves on with her career, in another state. During her tenure as our nanny, Samantha proved daily that she personifies the qualities of trustworthiness, punctuality, patience, flexibility, and a love for children. Your kids will absolutely love her, as will you. We simply cannot say enough to accurately describe our appreciation for Samantha, and we give her our highest endorsement.
